tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE quantum_hardware_components (
 component_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 component_name VARCHAR(50),
 component_type VARCHAR(50),
 status VARCHAR(20),
 availability BOOLEAN
)

CREATE TABLE hardware_availability (
    availability_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    component_id INT NOT NULL,
    available BOOLEAN NOT NULL,
    last_updated TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    FOREIGN KEY (component_id) REFERENCES quantum_hardware_components(component_id)
);

CREATE TABLE component_availability (
    availability_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    component_id INT,
    status_id INT,
    availability_date DATE,
    available_qty INT
);

CREATE TABLE quantum_hardware_components (
    component_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    component_name VARCHAR(50),
    model_number VARCHAR(20),
    manufacturer VARCHAR(50),
    availability BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE component_history (
    history_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    component_id INT,
    status_id INT,
    history_description TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP
);

CREATE TABLE component_locations (
    location_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    component_id INT,
    location_name VARCHAR(50),
    floor_number INT,
    room_number VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE hardware_vendors (
    vendor_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    vendor_name VARCHAR(50),
    contact_person_name VARCHAR(50),
    contact_email VARCHAR(50),
    contact_phone VARCHAR(15)
);
